*Description:*<br/>
A shoulder throw involves throwing an opponent over the shoulder. This attack throws the enemy in front of the attack directly behind the attack. An enemy starting at X will end up at E. Any enemies in the path of the enemy being thrown will also take the damage amount. The distance thrown is 3 tiles at base plus an additional tile for every 25 strength.
